title: Realme Narzo 50A Prime is the first phone from the company to ship without a charging brick
content:
Realme has added another model to the Narzo 50 series. Today, the company unveiled the Realme Narzo 50A Prime in India, a budget-friendly smartphone that offers a good-looking design, a large battery, and a 50MP primary camera. It’s also the first smartphone from the company to ship without a charging brick. Realme Narzo 50A Prime:

The post Realme Narzo 50A Prime is the first phone from the company to ship without a charging brick appeared first on XDA.
description: Realme has launched the Realme Narzo 50A Prime in India. It features a 6.6-inch FHD+ display, Unisoc T612 SoC, and a 5,000mAh battery.
